author: Gina Kolata
title: Are you a coronavirus superspreader? And why are some people so infectious?
description: As coronavirus continues to tear around the world, scientists are asking: Are some people more infectious than others? Are there superspreaders, people who seem to just spew out virus, making them especially likely to infect others? It seems that the answer i…
